component.name: slskdN
component.summary: A decentralized mesh community service for Soulseek with VPN and advanced networking

description.p: slskdN is a modern, private, decentralized mesh community service for Soulseek, written in C#. It's a fork of the original slskd project with enhanced features including:

ul.li: Pod-scoped VPN for secure private networking between trusted community members
Multi-source content delivery from multiple community peers simultaneously
Decentralized mesh overlay network for peer discovery and community coordination
Advanced search with MusicBrainz integration for content discovery
Privacy features with Tor/I2P transport support and traffic analysis protection
Enterprise-grade security with certificate pinning and rate limiting
Modern web interface for easy management and VPN configuration
RESTful API for automation and community service integration
Anonymous transports (WebSocket, HTTP tunnel, Obfs4, Meek)

description.p: slskdN prioritizes user privacy and network health while providing enterprise-grade security features and VPN capabilities for secure, private decentralized community services.
Pod-Scoped VPN and Advanced Networking Release.
This major release introduces enterprise-grade VPN capabilities and comprehensive networking features for secure, private decentralized community services.

ul.li: Pod-Scoped VPN: Secure private networking between trusted community members with encrypted tunnels
Mesh Overlay Network: Decentralized peer discovery and community coordination
Anonymous Transports: Tor, I2P, WebSocket, HTTP tunnel, Obfs4, and Meek protocol support
Privacy Layer: Traffic analysis protection with message padding, timing obfuscation, and batching
Enterprise Security: Certificate pinning, rate limiting, comprehensive threat mitigation
Enhanced Web UI: Modern interface for VPN configuration and community management
Content Moderation: Peer reputation system and content filtering
Multi-Source Delivery: Efficient peer-to-peer content distribution from multiple sources

description.p: Initial Flatpak release with core Soulseek functionality.

ul.li: Complete Soulseek network integration
Modern web interface for easy management
Multi-source download support for efficient transfers
Basic privacy and security features
RESTful API for automation and integration
